title: Synthesis, antimicrobial activity and application of polymers of praseodymium complexes based on pyridine nitrogen oxide
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18519-18527
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03003F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Qiuyin Zhu, Wayne Hsu, Shenglong Wang, Fenglong Lin, Yincai Wu, Yimin Fang, Jinglin Chen, Lijun Song
Conventional antimicrobials based on pyridine nitrogen oxides often pose health risks due to heavy metal enrichment. In contrast, low-toxicity rare earth ions replacing heavy metals in combination with pyridine nitrogen oxides would reduce this risk.
